title: RoyalRogue
author: RoyalRogue
content: I am working on a new crypto project (meme coin) and am need of a web developer to work with us over the long term. I am not posting details about the project publicly until launch, however you need to know that this is not a paid position, you will receive coins from the project for the work done (x coins per $ you would have charged).I have the logo already and only need a basic/static web template to be used for all pages, no CMS or backend needed (at this stage at least).I have a VPS with the basics already in place (including SSL cert) along with FTP access.If you have some spare time and are wanting/willing to be part of something new and fun please reply to this thread with some links to website's you've previously designed.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: RoyalRogue on May 15, 2023, 10:32:31 PMI am working on a new crypto project (meme coin) and am need of a web developer to work with us over the long term. I am not posting details about the project publicly until launch, however you need to know that this is not a paid position, you will receive coins from the project for the work done (x coins per $ you would have charged).I have the logo already and only need a basic/static web template to be used for all pages, no CMS or backend needed (at this stage at least).I have a VPS with the basics already in place (including SSL cert) along with FTP access.If you have some spare time and are wanting/willing to be part of something new and fun please reply to this thread with some links to website's you've previously designed.If you have no budget for web design and development then how you will run the project? Do, you want to use all the free services (as you are not paying anything except the coin you are creating. This types of project cant be nothing but turning into a scam project, I think.

comments.author: RoyalRogue
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on May 16, 2023, 07:48:22 PMQuote from: RoyalRogue on May 15, 2023, 10:32:31 PMI am working on a new crypto project (meme coin) and am need of a web developer to work with us over the long term. I am not posting details about the project publicly until launch, however you need to know that this is not a paid position, you will receive coins from the project for the work done (x coins per $ you would have charged).I have the logo already and only need a basic/static web template to be used for all pages, no CMS or backend needed (at this stage at least).I have a VPS with the basics already in place (including SSL cert) along with FTP access.If you have some spare time and are wanting/willing to be part of something new and fun please reply to this thread with some links to website's you've previously designed.If you have no budget for web design and development then how you will run the project? Do, you want to use all the free services (as you are not paying anything except the coin you are creating. This types of project cant be nothing but turning into a scam project, I think.I appreciate your thoughts. I am also adding my own time in developing the project however I am not a super skilled web developer. If need be I'll pay for the development directly.I appreciate there would have to be a level of trust here, but I am not asking for anyone to pay anything as I have already paid for the VPS to be used for the hosting. There won't be a pre-sale, post sale or any other sort of sale. The project is not designed to raise money or profit anyone.It is also not endless hours of work, I only need a simple static template for the site.
